panels.description: This panel should show no activity in a stable cluster. Some leadership transition events are expected, such as during cluster upgrades. Unexpected events may indicate an issue with cluster stability
panels.title: Election Events

panels.description: Measures the time since the leader was last able to contact the follower nodes when checking its leader lease
panels.title: Last Contacted

panels.description: Oldest log age lowest point should be at least 2x higher than last restore duration
panels.title: Raft replication overview

panels.description: Time difference between when a message was first passed into Raft and when the resulting commit took place on the leader
panels.title: Raft Commit Time

panels.description: Time to write log, mark in flight, and start replication to followers
panels.title: Raft Dispatch Log

panels.description: The time it takes for a Raft transaction to be replicated to a quorum of followers
panels.title: Raft Append Entries

panels.description: Number of Raft transactions - general indicator of the write load on the servers.
panels.title: Raft Apply Count

panels.description: Time it takes for a server to apply Raft entries to the internal state machine.
panels.title: Raft FSM apply

panels.description: Current index applied to FSM
panels.title: Raft Applied Index

panels.description: Increments when an agent is marked dead and then recovers within a short time period. This can be an indicator of overloaded agents, network problems, or configuration errors where agents cannot connect to each other on the required ports.
panels.title: Member flap

panels.description: Increments when an agent is marked dead. This can be an indicator of overloaded agents, network problems, or configuration errors where agents cannot connect to each other on the required ports.
panels.title: Member failed

panels.description: Increments when an agent joins the cluster. If an agent flapped or failed this counter also increments when it re-joins.
panels.title: Member join

panels.description: Increments when an agent leaves the cluster.
panels.title: Member left

panels.description: Number of one-off RPC requests a server has handled
panels.title: RPC requests

panels.description:
Number of potentially blocking RPCs a server has received.
Blocking request  is a form of long polling in which a server will attempt to keep the connection open while waiting for changes in the requested data.
panels.title: RPC blocking

panels.description: Increments for each RPC between client and server nodes
panels.title: RPC client requests

panels.description: Increments when client RPC exceeds locally configured RPC limit
panels.title: RPC client exceeded

panels.description: Number of errors a Consul server has encountered while serving a one-off RPC request
panels.title: RPC errors

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent in client mode makes an RPC request to a Consul server and fails.
panels.title: RPC client errors

panels.description: Shows the time spent handling a domain queries for each node. A spike here may indicate that there are too many concurrent domain queries, or the catalog is under high contention.
panels.title: Domain Query Time

panels.description: Shows the rate of domain queries per node
panels.title: DNS Queries

panels.description: Show the time spent handling a reverse DNS query for the given node.
panels.title: Reverse Query Time

panels.description: Shows the rate of reverse DNS queries per node
panels.title: Reverse Queries

panels.description: This measures the time it takes to complete an update to the KV store.
panels.title: KV Apply Time

panels.description: Show the rate of updates applied to the KV store.
panels.title: KV Apply Count

panels.description: Measures the time it takes to complete catalog register or deregister operations.
panels.title: Catalog Operation Time

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives a catalog register request
panels.title: Register

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives an RPC error for a catalog register request.
panels.title: Register errors

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives a catalog deregister request.
panels.title: Deregister

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives an RPC error for a catalog deregister request.
panels.title: Deregister errors

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives a request to list services from the catalog.
panels.title: Services

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives an RPC error for a request to list services.
panels.title: Services errors

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives a request to list datacenters in the catalog.
panels.title: Datacenters

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives an RPC error for a request to list datacenters.
panels.title: Datacenters errors

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives a request to list nodes from the catalog.
panels.title: Nodes

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives an RPC error for a request to list nodes.
panels.title: Nodes errors

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives a request to list services registered in a node.
panels.title: Node services

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives an RPC error for a request to list services in a node.
panels.title: Node services errors

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives a request to list nodes offering a service.
panels.title: Service nodes

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives an RPC error for a request to list nodes offering a service.
panels.title: Service nodes error

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives a request to list services associated with a gateway.
panels.title: Gateway services

panels.description: Increments whenever a Consul agent receives an RPC error for a request to list services associated with a gateway.
panels.title: Gateway services errors

panels.description: Increments for each catalog query for the given service.
panels.title: Service

panels.description: Increments for each catalog query for the given service with the given tags.
panels.title: Service tags

panels.description: Increments for each connect-based catalog query for the given service.
panels.title: Connect

panels.description: Increments for each connect-based catalog query for the given service with the given tags.
panels.title: Connect tags

panels.description: Increments for each catalog query where the given service could not be found.
panels.title: Service not found

panels.description: Increments for each connect-based catalog query where the given service could not be found.
panels.title: Connect not found

panels.description: The number of seconds until the root CA expires, updated every hour.
panels.title: Mesh root CA

panels.description: The number of seconds until the signing CA expires, updated every hour.
panels.title: Mesh Signing CA

panels.description: The number of seconds until the Agent TLS certificate expires, updated every hour.
panels.title: Agent TLS cert expiry
